alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Levy; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Citrus, northern Sumter and southeastern Levy Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 111 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Crystal River Airport, or 18 miles northwest of Homosassa Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Williston, Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Williston Highlands, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Homosassa, Inverness Highlands North, Williston Municipal Airport, Hernando, Inglis, Arbor Lakes, Lecanto, Citronelle, Leisure Acres, Pine Ridge, Citrus Hills, Gospel Island, and Brent Wood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Levy; Sumter
